p: All data are from publicly available Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS), available at https://dhsprogram.com/data/. The software we developed for this study is available as an open source package for the R statistical programming environment, available at https://cran.r-project.org/package=SUMMER [ 49]. All of the R code used to produce the results described in this article is available at https://github.com/richardli/AfricaU5MR.
